Name: Vines and Thorns
Description: Nature calls to you.  You ask for aid.  The aid is given.

Defend.Name: Thorns
Defend.Action_String: Thorns grow around <User>, reflecting 5 damage for 3 rounds.

Defend.Name: Vines
Defend.Action_String: Vines grow around <User>, shielding 5 damage for 3 rounds.

Attack.Name: Branch
Attack.Action_String: <User> hits <Target> with a branch, dealing <Damage> damage.

Attack Crit.Name: Grow
Attack Crit.Action_String: The power of nature restores <User>, healing 5 damage.

Special.Name: Constrict
Special.Action_String: <User> sets vines to constrict <Target>. <Target> will take <Damage> damage for 3 rounds.
